commands.name: cat
commands.description: Displays a picture of a cat.

commands.name: flip
commands.description: Flips a coin.

commands.name: addmacro
commands.description: Adds a macro by the which will respond with the given message when invoked by the given name.

commands.name: removemacro
commands.description: Removes a macro with the given name

commands.name: listmacros
commands.description: List all of the currently available macros.

commands.name: nuke
commands.description: Delete the last 1 - 99 messages in the chat.

commands.name: move
commands.description: Move every message found within the given search space sent by any supplied ID in the Comma separated ID list to the specified channel.
commands.structure:: {idList (a list of ids, separated by commas)} {searchSpace} {targetChannelID}

commands.name: ignore
commands.description: Drop all commands from the given id (user or channel)

commands.name: mute
commands.description: Mute a member for a specified amount of minutes.

commands.name: lockdown
commands.description: Force the bot to ignore anyone who isn't the owner.

commands.name: prefix
commands.description: Set the bot prefix to the specified string (Cannot be a space)

commands.name: setFilter
commands.description: Set the permission level required to run a command which contains a mention (used for mention sanitation)

commands.name: setperm
commands.description: Set the permission level of the given command to the given permission level.

commands.name: getPerm
commands.description: Get the current required permission level for a particular command.

commands.name: listcommands
commands.description: List all commands

commands.name: listavailable
commands.description: List what commands are available to you.

commands.name: listPerms
commands.description: List all available permission levels.

commands.name: listCommandPerms
commands.description: Display all current commands and the corresponding required permission level to use each of them.

commands.name: warn
commands.description: Warn a member, giving them a 0 strike infraction with the given reason.

commands.name: strike
commands.description: Give a member a weighted infraction, with specified weight and reason. This may result in them being banned. Weights should be below or equal to StrikeCeil
commands.example: 1324234523048 1 Refusing to stop arguing. Please pay more attention to what moderators are saying to you

commands.name: history
commands.description: Display a user's infraction history.

commands.name: removeStrike
commands.description: Delete a particular strike by ID (these are listed in the history command).

commands.name: cleanse
commands.description: Completely wipe a user of all infractions. (Permanently deletes them)

commands.name: ping
commands.description: Pong!

commands.name: help
commands.description: Display a help menu.

commands.name: serverinfo
commands.description: Display a message giving basic server information

commands.name: exit
commands.description: Exit, saving configurations.

commands.name: kill
commands.description: Exit, without saving configurations.

commands.name: uptime
commands.description: Displays how long you have kept me, HOTBOT, AWAKE!

commands.name: sendInfoMessage
commands.description: Display some information about me
